data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 1,693,166 believers in the state of Seoul.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Seoul, South Korea
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Seoul.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Seoul, South Korea to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 10,349,300 people living in Seoul through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Japanese people.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Seoul, South Korea today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Seoul.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.section_summary:
the state of Seoul, South Korea has a population of 10,349,300.

We estimate Seoul has 1,693,166 people who might know Jesus, 1,422,128 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,234,005 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 1,693,166 believers find a person of peace today among the 8,656,133 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
